website_summaries.verdict: A premium dog life jacket that blends fashion and function like never before.
pros: Includes a convenient handle on top for quick and easy grabbing
Boasts reflective accents and bright colors, guaranteeing that you will have no trouble seeing the life jacket on your dog
Provides adjustable nylon straps and quick-release buckles to ensure the life jacket fits your dog perfectly
cons: May be too wide or too long for some dogs

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this life jacket for my dog to take on vacation July 19. The first time I put it on him and he got in the water and I went to hold onto him by the handle it ripped off in my hand . He’s only a year old and his first time in water . We got back home from vacation today July 24. I went online to return this item and it says the return window has closed . I would like a refund. I do not recommend this item .
customer_reviews.author: Cyberconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Fin Won't Stay Up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my lab who loves to swim but gets scared when she can't touch the bottom. She doesn't dislike it by any means and I noticed she's more confident playing with her friends at the pup beach now. Pros: Very cute Easy to Put On Has a Harness Grip for Leashes Cons: Chafes her Underside Fin Won't Stay Up Not as Much Floatation Help as I Wish Stitching started to come undone because she pulled on the leash Probably fairly good for smaller dogs. It's not great for my lab, but it was most definitely better than nothing 😊 If you found my review helpul, please let me know with an upvote :)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Luisa

customer_reviews.title: but once they get to know them they always become best friends.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the dogs floating. Only draw back is the dogs are jealous when they show up at the pool. Some dogs are intimidated when they see another dog with a fin, but once they get to know them they always become best friends.
customer_reviews.author: The husband

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid or Fishy?
customer_reviews.text: My Australian Shepherd is so cute. My little fishy. Material seems durable. 3 buckles are large and have plenty of adjustment room I really like the neck piece because it wraps around like a hug. My previous vest had a separate float that wouldn’t stay put. Delivered on time. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cry'n Angel

customer_reviews.title: Does not help dog float
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 65 pound dog. He is new to the water and still panics. We need something that will actually make him float so he can feel comfortable in the water at the lake. This was not it. I'm now on the search for something that will float and will be returning this. This jacket fit great and it was a good thing that it had a handle so we were able to pull him out before he about had a heart attack. Lesson learned - don't go for the fun shark fin design but instead go for something that will actually save my dog in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Frayer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product due to the fact that my family was going to Minnesota and this was the first year we brought our dog with. He does not care for water so I figured a life jacket would make him and me more comfortable having him on the water on the boat and in the water. He is a 25lb beagle and the medium fit him perfectly. He did not seem to mind having it on one bit. It did it’s job and kept him afloat while he was in the water. The only downside is the fin didn’t like to stay up but that did not affect the functionality of the jacket at all.
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: STURDY
customer_reviews.text: We basically needed jacket to get the bigger water dog out of the lake...as for float protection I really couldn't say it seemed to help as he tired. He learned not to get in the lake without the jacket, the dogs willingly put them on and the handle was very helpful before we taught the 65lb dog to use the ladder. We were able to lift him - see video - jackets held up nicely, no tears, rips, etc. Honestly for the price I didn't expect the handle to make it through the weekend but it did and they have now been placed in our life jacket collection ;0) size XL 65lb labradoodle
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute to be honest but unfortunately it was way to big for my dog to use in the pool that when he was wore it in the pool he’s legs slipped got stuck and he was crying because he couldn’t move or swim , I was hoping to return it for a smaller size since I do love the style, material and thickness in it , but i destroyed the box it came in and I used it already assuming it would fit. I might just give it to my sister to enjoy and just purchase one in store .. FYI: my dog is a Malti-Tzu who weights 7 pounds and I ordered a Small do to reviews
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Fine fit and my dog was happy running around with ...
customer_reviews.text: My pug was swimming! Fine fit and my dog was happy running around with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Just when you thought about going back in the water.
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for to bring my dog to the lake. She didn’t seem to mind it and it provided her with just enough extra bouyancy so she didn’t struggle in the water. It also gave me peace of mind. The shark fin adds a great cute factor.
customer_reviews.author: PJTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend this one...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because my dog swam better and could actually float with the life jacket off. My dog is a healthy Shih Tzu that can swim but not as well as some of the larger breeds so I got this life jacket for the extra floatation. This life jacket did not work at all, it seemed like he was sinking when trying to swim with it on. I would not recommend this item..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on my 80 lb pit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my 80 lb pit, the padding is too thin to work as a life preserver but I'm sure it will help. The fin doesn't stand up though.
customer_reviews.author: HempOrDie

customer_reviews.title: This will kill your pet
customer_reviews.text: This is a TERRIBLE lifejacket for your pet. Do Not buy under any circumstances. Because of the poor design of this pruduct the very first time i left go of my pet in the water he immediately rolled on to his side and struggled to keep his head above water. I took it off thinking i had put it on wrong but the second time out he rolled just like the first time. This went directly to my trash can.
customer_reviews.author: tkane

customer_reviews.title: Sizes aren't quite perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for my doggos. It made them comfortable in the water and made them look cute. My only issue is that the sizing isn't quite perfect. They both fit small for what the sizing chart said. Though I was able to strap the lifejacket on, the velcro support under the belly was too small to wrap around for total comfort and security.
customer_reviews.author: Kema Leota

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: I have a french bulldog who weights roughly 35 pounds. I was worried the large wouldn’t fit him because french bulldogs are built weird but it was perfect him! The only issue I had with it was that the straps to the buckles were not sewn down correctly so the straps kept coming out of the buckles. I fixed and the life jacked works great. I especially like that it had a band that goes under his neck to keep his head up when he swims.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this life vest for my fur baby. I posted these photos for people who have a English bulldog and want to see how it looks on them. He was a little stand-offish at first. But when he was in the water he loved it and made it easier for him to swim. We went off the measurements shown on the site and fit him a little bit. (But we ordered it before summer came) so he grew into it. The straps were also a little hard to tighten and loosen. That is the only downfall I see from this product. Other than that I recommend this life vest.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Dabney

customer_reviews.title: Not good floatation device but excellent costume!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really act as a floatation device so much as a cute thing I can put on my dog and only LOOKS like I care about his safety. In all actuality, unless your dog already knows how to swim sans life jacket, and really needs a floatation protection device, just pick one that works as that.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur the Cardi

customer_reviews.title: The fin doesn’t stand up it lays sideways
customer_reviews.text: This jacket does it’s job but I feel like it’s almost false advertising with the fin. The fin does NOT stand up. It lays sideways even when my dog is swimming. Doesn’t look great but oh well
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: We just used this as we had not been able to go to the beach until now. Was only used for maybe 2 hours and the clip for the leash is already tearing apart the fabric. I can’t use it again because it is going to rip completely then my dog will be loose on the beach. Very disappointed to have wasted money on this for 2 hours at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.  Will be buying a second!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Functionally it kept my pug’s sweet face above the water line. There are three straps that can be adjusted to the correct size of your pooch. I would buy this again. The fin looked awesome and made for some great instagram photos.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but a lot of the stitching fell apart with the first use. One piece of Velcro ripped right off the first time I opened it. Fit and design are good, tho. Just needs better quality control
customer_reviews.author: rachbick

customer_reviews.title: Not a one size fits all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 70lb dog at the size they recommended and it was too small to fit around his midsection. It also didn’t appear buoyant enough to keep the dog afloat. It may be good for toy dog sized dogs but for a 70lb pit bull not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Seabee

customer_reviews.title: IF YOUR DOG IS OVER WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: IF YOUR DOG IS OVER WEIGHT LIKE MINE? IT DOESN'T LOOK LIKE IT HAS A WHOLE LOT OF BUOYANCY ITS KINDA THIN. SO I RETURNED IT.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: People love seeing my Boston Terrier wear this out in the lake. The fin does flop over after a while of being in the water.
customer_reviews.author: cb96

customer_reviews.title: Size runs large
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a large for my Aussie. Measured him exactly to the size chart. When it arrived it was way too big. Returned it for a medium size. Fits perfectly. The fin did not stand up on the back. I shoved a small wire into the back of the fin all along the seem. It's perfect now. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for an inexperienced puppy to learn how to swim
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cute vest that I am using to help my young puppy to learn the basics without the fear of sinking.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Tillson

customer_reviews.title: Fin didn’t stay up
customer_reviews.text: My dog is about 60 pounds. It worked good for him in the springs but kind bummed the fine doesn’t stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Zingo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I’ve ever purchased from Amazon. The fin doesn’t stay up even out of water, and when in water it just sits sideways on top of the water, so you end up paying a premium price for a crappy dog life vest. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Paige S.

customer_reviews.title: How adorable and practical
customer_reviews.text: Kept my little guy floating when he fell off our pontoon. He doesn’t mind wearing it either. He’s able to swim well with it on too. Makes it so he can join our family swimming in the beautiful lakes of WV!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not much protection
customer_reviews.text: It is so thin and flimsy that I don't think it could keep my dog about water for long. Not only that, but I tested in by placing in my pool and it failed. It had a bunch of holes that filled up with water.
customer_reviews.author: fitstylegrace

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute on our pup! She doesnt mind wearing it and liles that she doesnt sink. She just floats arou d joyfully
customer_reviews.author: edward krausman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit just right. Wish the dorsal stayed upright it would make for more fin..I mean fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L.

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on Refund -  Made Well But Way Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Runs Really Big for my Pomeranian - Chihuahua Description & Chart Measurements Not Accurate Shark Fin Flimsy & Falls Flat to the Side Sewing Looks Strong & Made to Last if it fits
customer_reviews.author: MakahaBeach@Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome life jacket, easy to grab my dog and helps him swim longer. I wish the handle pad was a little thicker. Also the fin doesn’t stay up but I purchased this because so wanted it to function as a life jacket not as a costume.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty handle great for lifting dog out of the water we bought another one for my other dog and the handle is junk
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great product for swimming dogs
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Miniature Dachshund. Doesn’t bother him. He rocks it with style. Dog shark!
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but not effective
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cute, but if you need to keep your dog afloat, this life preserver will not suffice. It is not very buoyant. The shark fin doesn’t stand straight up. The Velcro strip will rub against your dogs belly and cause irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: When I went to get ready for this year the straps had degraded to the point they crumbled in my hands. Grab handle pulled right off.
customer_reviews.author: Willisb

customer_reviews.title: The Fin doesn’t stay up
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly but I’m disappointed with the Fin because it doesn’t stay up like it was advertised. Still not sure if I’m keeping it, I was excited to have my dog look like a little shark in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: BaWha

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect just a little big in the chest but very good quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Zeus wont get in the lake without it! Hes not the best swimmer and having the handle on top is perfect for getting him on and off the boat.
customer_reviews.author: _chef_moe_

customer_reviews.title: Safe pool float for our mermaid.
customer_reviews.text: Our little mermaid doesn’t love her suit just yet but we love it. It took some adjusting to fit her body but we figured it out. Our pool is new and this make me feel comfortable with our baby in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mcphail

customer_reviews.title: The fin has E.D.
customer_reviews.text: The fin didn’t stay up. Other than the flotation factor, the shark fin was the reason I bought it... :/
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy but fin doesnt stick up
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and fits well, main issue is the fin doesnt really stay up
customer_reviews.author: Nicole viar

customer_reviews.title: Floppy Fin
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our dog not only for safety but for the look. The vest was folded when arrived and the shark fin was not standing up. We thought over time or once it was on the dog and in the water it was wet the fun would stand up. But no, we have have a floppy fin shark.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket fin not so good
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that I disliked was the fin doesn’t stand up great. but works awesome otherwise!$!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They are cute. Fit well. The only thing was the shark fin doesnt stand up it falls to the side. Over all good.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Cute. My dogs are a hit at the dock. Good fit
customer_reviews.author: Ava D

customer_reviews.title: Mommy Shark do do do
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our one dog who lives to go with us to the river and lake. It’s a great product and really works well.. we even had other people asking to try it on their pups.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Well made and does a great job of keeping my dog afloat.
customer_reviews.author: david allen

customer_reviews.title: So cute and great
customer_reviews.text: Our corgi isn't a fan of it but we still love it and think its adorable
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: safty first for my babies
customer_reviews.text: Large fits perfect and will be trying it out soon. Looks well made!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: FIT
customer_reviews.text: HUUUUUUUUGE!! DON'T BELIEVE THE SIZE!! OUR DOGS ARE KLEE-KAIS. WE WENT WITH THE DIMENSIONS GIVEN AND THERE IS NO WAY THEY WOULD EVER EVEN WORK!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. The fit is great, the velcro and straps are great. The handle on the top is really convenient for lifting on and off boats or jet skis. Our pup is 17 lbs, it works great for her. Its adorable too!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Bad Size
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is not accurate, runs way too small, all looks good before have it on my dog, very frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Satous

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, take off, and wash. It’s super light, our doggo is 14.5lbs and we got a small, although XS may be a better fit on the body...
customer_reviews.author: DuncanDoughnuts

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun during the summer! Well made and worked well!!! Ty
customer_reviews.author: scott c.

customer_reviews.title: Safe, efficient, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought for our dog. No worries with this lifejacket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and useful. Runs bigger than expected I had to exchange for a smaller size. Of course Amazon made it very easy.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE FOR DOGS
customer_reviews.text: Handle ripped off the 1st time we went to the lake. Very poor quality. Not safe for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra Peters

customer_reviews.title: These life jackets are great for our small dogs
customer_reviews.text: These life jackets are great for our small dogs. They were them in the pool and we can take them with us boating and we don't need to worry about them.
customer_reviews.author: MMS-MOM

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it should be
customer_reviews.text: I Got a medium in a fit too tight even though the measurements of my dog fit the medium description hes an English bulldog about one year old
customer_reviews.author: Jose Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Too cute! The large fits good for my 75lb Golden, though the Velcro strap on the tummy was cutting it close. The shark fin doesn’t stay up on its own all the time on land but when it does it’s adorable! It’s slender, breathable and I love the handle on the top, makes pulling him into the kayak much easier 😊🐾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Small was too small and medium was too big, no in between but it works
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Sub par for an amateur
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it does the job and keeps my pup afloat without making her tip or flip, but I mainly got this jacket for the cute shark fin and it doesn’t stand up when she is swimming): it looks like a sad whale from sea world
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is 27 lbs and I ordered a size M. It fits perfectly. Not sure how much flotation it will provide in water. Haven’t tried it out yet. Looks super cute though!
customer_reviews.author: Jian

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in April. All of the straps have literally disintegrated and fallen off. The item is no longer usable after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fin is floppy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my dog afloat, but the fin will not stay up. It just lays to the side. The whole purpose of this purchase was for the shark fin.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog Mommy
customer_reviews.text: I am ABSOLUTELY in love with this doggy life jacket! My dog (Boston Terrier) is safe and able to doggy paddle to the side of any pool. It looks fabulous on him! It’s stylish and slink. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doggie life vest fits well
customer_reviews.text: This doggie life jacket is adorable and so easy to put on. And it appears that it would do the job to help him float! nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Bay-by shark da-da da-da da da
customer_reviews.text: The velcro made it harder to adjust the size needed for the mid portion. Our golden has a larger rib cage but a smaller stomach area but when fanageled with, it fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron See

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and looks like high quality. We will try it out next weekend. Our Corgi will be stylin and safe while canoeing!
customer_reviews.author: SIL03446

customer_reviews.title: Great for the River
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the sizing; however, it was accurate, and my dog doesn’t mind wearing it, so it must be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great life vest
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Love the quality. Product is better than described.
customer_reviews.author: David Green

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it is very thin and the fin does not stand up straight. It does not look like what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C. Ollis

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect...easy to adjust and of course lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stepenosky

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This was good quality and fit well. The handle was convenient to help lift our dog out and into the water!! So cute😊
customer_reviews.author: LindsayW

customer_reviews.title: In between sizes
customer_reviews.text: I have a 45 lb wheaten terrier. She is all muscle. The large was way too big (the belly Velcro overlapped so much it didn’t actually work). The medium is too small. Sorry to have to return it because it’s so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Z

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Shark fin does not stay up, it’s useless, also ripped by handle on first use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! My little shark
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My little shark! The sizing that they give is spot on. I measured the way that it says to and it fits perfect. I had to tighten it a little but this way if he gets any bigger he has a little room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like picture!
customer_reviews.text: The fin does not stand up like the picture. It just flops down, making it pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That he feels comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: Our bulldog loves it. It is perfect for him. He even jumps in the pool and loves to swim around.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Fash

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Chart Is Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size Large under direction from the sizing chart and when it arrived it was way to big for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my grand dog, Hunter. It fits and keeps him safe when he’s rafting with my son.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Geiger

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I liked this, worked well. Just wish it came in xs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fin is floppy
customer_reviews.text: The fin does not stand up, even in the water. That is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Y.

customer_reviews.title: Strong material
customer_reviews.text: Secure, reinforced and durable. Surprising for the low price. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Faulhaber

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Super cute on my pup and helped him float! Fit well and good priced
customer_reviews.author: Anna G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well - held my dog up in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: cc123

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love this life jacket for my dog and it was perfect, fit was accurate according to size chart!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Floppy fin.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s nice for the price. It does it’s job. But the fin doesn’t stand up :( it just flops to the side. I’m sure there’s a way I could rig it but I haven’t tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to list measurements.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was too small. There were no measurements given. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: SYoung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The small fit my 17 lb corgi perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Kent

customer_reviews.title: Size Small for 15lbs Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Got a size small for my 15 lb yorkie and it fits perfectly. I can pick her up like a suitcase with this.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Huynh

customer_reviews.title: I have a pug and the small fits great. He got alot of "awwwwww's"
customer_reviews.text: I have a pug and the small fits great. He got alot of "awwwwww's". Super cute and looks comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and fits good. Can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great life jacket!!! My Pug loved it and he was a hit at the beach 🦈
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Fin doesn’t stand up :(
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good jacket but the fin doesn’t stand up... that’s lame and should be expressed at least in description lol
customer_reviews.author: Tye MoHawk

customer_reviews.title: seemed to fit my dog well but when he got ...
customer_reviews.text: seemed to fit my dog well but when he got in the pool the buoyancy of the jacket made him lean to the side & go under water. unfortunately I wasn’t able to try it out until after it was too late to return it so now I’m stuck with a jacket that almost drowns my pup. 😩
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Good handle
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit thin to actually help float. The fin won't stay up on its own but it's cute and was a gift for a friends dog. At least now we can get a hold of her easier with the handle on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: A-MORE Dog Life Jackets Dog Saver Life Jacket Dog Swimming Vest Adjustable Life Jacket for Dogs
product_meta.description:
Size:S| Color:Grey
Dog life jacket Lightweight, Durable, Adjustable Velcro and D-Buckle, Portable and Saftey Handle, Easy Drying and Cleaning, Super Cute Shark Stlye design.

Offer your pet the most considerate care

feature_bullets: DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT---High quality polyester Material is Durable and the life jacket is lightweight,Super cute design
ADJUSTABLE VELCRO AND BUCKLE--Dog life jackets have velcro around the waist and the neck and also buckles in both places,the buckles are adjustable,you can tighten or loosen as much as you need
PORTABLE AND SAFTEY HANDLE ---Have safety Handle on top of the dog lifejackets,to lift dog in or out of the water easily
EASY DRYING AND CLEANING---Advanced breathable mesh underbelly for proper draining and drying
Dog life jacket fit for Beach, Pool, Boating, Lake,Swimming,Hunting, Surfing
